div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
φακρα فقرا تقسم تقسم لــها للمسكين والفقرا
دينارين وسدس
μυρμυναυξ
إذموشينف تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
دينر
αμμωνιαν
أميان تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
ربع دينر
ισιου κατω
سلــ شلــ تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
درهمين ورق
σπανια
صفنيّة تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
μουχινταλη
موش دل تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
دينرين وربع وقيراط
θολθις μεγαλη
ثيلث تيلت الكبرى تقسّم لها للمسكين وللفقرا
أربعة دننير
σεφθα
سمسطا تقسّم لــها للمسكين وللفقرا
ثمنية

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
φακρα faqrā taqassama tuqsamu la hā li l masākīna wa ăl fuqarāʾi
dīnārayni wa suds:un
μυρμυναυξ
ʾiḏmūšīnafu taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
dīnār:un
αμμωνιαν
ʾamyānu taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
rubʿu dīnār:in
ισιου κατω
sal*** šal*** taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
dirhamayni waraq:un
σπανια
ṣafaniyyaẗu taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
μουχ(ι)νταλη
mūšu dalu taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
dīnārayni wa rubʿ:un wa qīrāṭ:un
θολθ(ις) μεγ(αλη)
ṯīlṯu tīltu ăl kubrà taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
ʾarbaʿaẗu danānīra
σεφθα
sumusṭā taqassama la hā li l masākīna wa li l fuqarāʾi
ṯamāniyaẗu ***

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
Fakra. Faqra - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor Fakra. Faqrā - There have been allotted to it for the needy and poor
two dīnārs and a sixth.
Murmunauks Myrmynaux
Idhmushinaf - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor ʾIḏmūšīnaf - There has been allotted to it for the needy and poor
one dīnār.
Ammonian Ammōnian
ʾAmyān - There has been allotted to it for the needy and poor Amyan - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor
a quarter of a dīnār.
Isiou Kato Isiou Katō
[lost name] - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor S/Šal[ - There have been allotted to it] for the needy and poor
two waraq dirhams.
Spania
Ṣafaniyya - There have been allotted to it for the needy and poor. Safaniyya - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor
Mouchintale Mouḵintalē
Mūš Dal - There have been allotted to it for the needy and poor Mush Dal - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor
two dīnārs and a quarter and a qīrāṭ.
Ṯolthis Megalē Tholthis Megale
Ṯilṯ/Tīlt al-Kubrā - There have been allotted to it for the needy and poor Thilt al-Kubra - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor
four dīnārs.
Seftha Sephtha
Sumusṭā - There have been allotted to [it for the needy and poor] Sumusta - There have been allotted to it for the needy and for the poor
eight [ ].
